Summary: Orange/red star like object in sky which my wife had noticed first,I came back from shop and noticed myself it rose up very quickly then shot off at a fantastic speed to the North/west
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Belfast
There were no other sightings in Belfast on or around December 31st 2009
divs: sighting detailsit was new years eve and i was getting ready to go to work (i drive a public hire taxi in belfast) and had to go to the petrol station to get petrol as it shut at 2100. driving back into my street i noticed a red\orange coloured light in the sky quite near jupiter in sky as it was a very clear cold night, i called my wife out to look at it as i thought it was so strange looking,she came out and we began to observe the object which after a few mins and dicussussions of what it might be as at first i thought it may be an airplane as we live under the flight paths of both the george best airport and belfast international which i discounted because of the colour of the object and no flashing navigation lights, it suddenly started to rise very quickly into the night sky, i turned to my wife who was still looking at the quickly deminishing object and missed the best bit because when i took my eyes off the object my wife seen it shoot off at a fantastic speed to the north\west.could it also be noted that this is now the third sighting of these kind of lights in the sky in the last 2 months, the first a single light orange coloured orb on holloween night and 2 weeks later multiple lights in a formation of sorts totaling 6 again orange coloured orbs.
